quote: Read books
author: Deliaha Hicks

quote: Book is book.
author: Lailah Gifty Akita

quote: Good books are about everything.
author: Andrew Smith,  Grasshopper Jungle

quote: Books, the children of the brain.
author: Jonathan Swift,  A Tale Of A Tub And Other Writings

quote: great books are the ones we need
author: Charles Bukowski,  The Last Night of the Earth Poems

quote: The best books... are those that tell you what you know already.
author: George Orwell,  1984

quote: Books are for people who wish they were somewhere else.
author: Mark Twain

quote: We live for books.
author: Umberto Eco

quote: Books. Cats. Life is Good.
author: Edward Gorey

quote: It is books that are a key to the wide world; if you can't do anything else, read all that you can.
author: Jane Hamilton

quote: I cannot live without books.
author: Thomas Jefferson

quote: If books are not good company, where shall I find it?
author: Mark Twain

quote: I wanted to live among books.
author: Alberto Manguel,  A History of Reading

quote: What are a friend's books for if not to be borrowed?
author: Tom Stoppard,  Arcadia

quote: If you love books enough, books will love you back.
author: Jo Walton,  Among Others

quote: Books remember all the things you cannot contain.
author: Elizabeth McCracken,  The Giant's House

quote: Books are for nothing but to inspire
author: Ralph Waldo Emerson

quote: Old books that we have known but not possessed cross our path and invite themselves over. New books try to seduce us daily with tempting titles and tantalizing covers.
author: Alberto Manguel,  The Library at Night

quote: Books are my friends, my companions. They make me laugh and cry and find meaning in life.
author: Christopher Paolini,  Eragon

quote: A good book is an event in my life.
author: Stendhal,  The Red and the Black

quote: I have all the books I could need, and what more could I need than books?
author: Catherynne M. Valente,  The Girl Who Ruled Fairyland - For a Little While

quote: Books have a way of finding their way into our lives, usually, right when we need them the most.
author: Richard P. Denney

quote: Of all things, I liked books best.
author: Nikola Tesla

quote: I believe in books.
author: Carole Maso,  Room Lit By Roses

quote: Books are the treasured wealth of the world and the fit inheritance of generations and nations.
author: Henry David Thoreau,  Walden

quote: I love books, they're in my blood.
author: Karen Marie Moning,  Shadowfever

quote: Books, I don't know what you see in them. I can understand a person reading them, but I can't for the life of me see why people have to write them.
author: Peter Ustinov

quote: Books are the most wonderful friends in the world. When you meet them and pick them up, they are always ready to give you a few ideas. When you put them down, they never get mad; when you take them up again, they seem to enrich you all the more.
author: Fulton J. Sheen,  Life Is Worth Living

quote: Books. People have no idea how beautiful books are. How they taste on your fingers. How bright everything is when you light it with words.
author: Rachel Kadish,  Tolstoy Lied: A Love Story

quote: Books open your mind, broaden your mind, and strengthen you as nothing else can.
author: William Feather

quote: They had only ever discussed books but what, in this life, is more personal than books?
author: Gabrielle Zevin,  The Storied Life of A.J. Fikry

quote: I hate books; they only teach us to talk about things we know nothing about.
author: Jean-Jacques Rousseau

quote: Write the book you want to read
author: Austin Kleon

quote: There are good books which are only for adults.There are no good books which are only for children.
author: W.H. Auden

quote: A book is a device to ignite the imagination.
author: Alan Bennett,  The Uncommon Reader

quote: The problem with books is that they end.
author: Caroline Kepnes,  You

quote: Books are the carriers of civilization...They are companions, teachers, magicians, bankers of the treasures of the mind. Books are humanity in print.
author: Barbara W. Tuchman

quote: So many books, so little time.
author: Frank Zappa

quote: They're book addicts.
author: Lemony Snicket,  The Miserable Mill

quote: I suggest that the only books that influence us are those for which we are ready, and which have gone a little further down our particular path than we have yet gone ourselves.
author: E.M. Forster

quote: I have never been able to resist a book about books.
author: Anne Fadiman,  Ex Libris: Confessions of a Common Reader

quote: I am too fond of reading books to care to write them.
author: Oscar Wilde,  The Picture of Dorian Gray

quote: Books do furnish a room.
author: Anthony Powell,  Dance to the Music of Time

quote: Books are the mirrors of the soul.
author: Virginia Woolf,  Between the Acts

quote: Books are challenging and inspirational to me.
author: Amy Sedaris

quote: A great book is a homing deviceFor navigating paradise.A good book somehow makes you careAbout the comfort of a chair.A bad book owes to many treesA forest of apologies.
author: J. Patrick Lewis

quote: Books are the compasses and telescopes and sextants and charts which other men have prepared to help us navigate the dangerous seas of human life.
author: Jesse Lee Bennett

quote: That's what this country needs -- more books!
author: Christopher Morley

quote: Sometimes I think books are the only friends worth having.
author: Susie Derkins

quote: It is a great thing to start life with a small number of really good books which are your very own.
author: Arthur Conan Doyle
